RecipeDef.label: small uncategorized research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on various fields with no specific well defined categorization.

RecipeDef.label: medium uncategorized research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium research project based on various fields with no specific well defined categorization.

RecipeDef.label: Large uncategorized research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on various fields with no specific well defined categorization.

RecipeDef.label: small mechanical research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on various mechanical fields. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on mechanical subjects.

RecipeDef.label: Medium mechanical research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on various mechanical fields. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on mechanical subjects.

RecipeDef.label: Large mechanical research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on various mechanical fields. Will greatly help advance the colony's knowledge on mechanical subjects.

RecipeDef.label: small textiles research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on various textile assembly trades. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items from fabrics and cloths.

RecipeDef.label: Medium textiles research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium research project based on various textile assembly trades. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items from fabrics and cloths.

RecipeDef.label: large textiles research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on various textile assembly trades. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items from fabrics and cloths.

RecipeDef.label: small cultural research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on anthropology. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items that will provide social benefits for colonists and lords.

RecipeDef.label: medium cultural research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on anthropology. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items that will provide social benefits for colonists and lords.

RecipeDef.label: large cultural research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on anthropology. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items that will provide social benefits for colonists and lords.

RecipeDef.label: Small biological research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on the biological sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on various fields, such as farming and botany.

RecipeDef.label: Medium biological research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on the biological sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the flora and fauna of this alien world.

RecipeDef.label: Large biological research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on the biological sciences. Will greatly advance the colony's knowledge on advanced biological fields.

RecipeDef.label: Small construction research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on basic construction techniques. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on building structures.

RecipeDef.label: Medium construction research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on intermediate construction techniques. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on building more complex structures.

RecipeDef.label: Large construction research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on advanced construction techniques. Will greatly advance the colony's knowledge on building the most complex structures.

RecipeDef.label: Small metallurgy research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on metallurgy. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of basic metal products.

RecipeDef.label: Medium metallurgy research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on metallurgy. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of advanced metal products.

RecipeDef.label: Small weaponry research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on the art of combat. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of weaponry.

RecipeDef.label: Medium weaponry research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on the art of combat. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of slightly advanced weaponry.

RecipeDef.label: Large weaponry research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on the art of combat. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of highly advanced weaponry and armour.

RecipeDef.label: Small electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on the usage of electricity. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the small-scale usage of electricity.

RecipeDef.label: Medium electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on electrical engineering. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of medium-scale electrical structures.

RecipeDef.label: Large electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on electrical engineering. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of advanced, large-scale electrical structures and products.

RecipeDef.label: Essential electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A research project based on harnessing the power of electricity. Will provide essential stepping stones in electrical research for the colony.

RecipeDef.label: Small medical research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on medical sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of basic medical products.

RecipeDef.label: Medium medical research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on medical sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of advanced medical products and techniques.

RecipeDef.label: Large medical research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on medical sciences. Will greatly advance the colony's knowledge on the production of highly advanced medical products.

RecipeDef.label: Small advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with highly advanced products and structures.

RecipeDef.label: Medium advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with highly advanced products and structures.

RecipeDef.label: Large advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with large-scale advanced technologies.

RecipeDef.label: Essential advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: An essential research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with vital technologies that will provide stepping stones to further projects.

RecipeDef.label: Small spacer research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on Glitterworld technologies. Will provide the colony with technologies only found on Glitterworlds.

RecipeDef.label: Medium spacer research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium research project based on Glitterworld technologies. Will provide the colony with technologies only found on Glitterworlds.

RecipeDef.label: Large spacer research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on Glitterworld technologies. Will provide the colony with technologies only found on Glitterworlds.

RecipeDef.label: small spacecraft research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on scavenged spacecraft parts and various visiting spaceships. Will provide the colony with spacecraft construction capabilities.

RecipeDef.label: medium spacecraft research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium research project based on scavenged spacecraft parts and various visiting spaceships. Will provide the colony with spacecraft construction capabilities.

RecipeDef.label: large spacecraft research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on scavenged spacecraft parts and various visiting spaceships. Will provide the colony with spacecraft construction capabilities.

RecipeDef.label: small ultratech research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on technologies observed and scavenged from the Shattered Empire that has colonised this world.

RecipeDef.label: medium ultratech research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium research project based on technologies observed and scavenged from the Shattered Empire that has colonised this world.

RecipeDef.label: Large ultratech research project
RecipeDef.description: A substantial research project based on technologies observed and scavenged from the Shattered Empire that has colonised this world.

RecipeDef.label: Mod research project
RecipeDef.description: A research project based on rumours and knowledge passed on from visitors. Will provide the colony with unique, bespoke research projects. (This experiment will unlock any random non-vanilla research project).
